title: Add/Update Chicken Manchuria menu item to ₹159 with food photo

requirements.text: Update the existing backend menu item with uuid "chicken-manchuria" so that it appears in the menu as "Chicken Manchuria" priced at ₹159 (price = 159). Ensure the item remains available and continues to belong to the single restaurant "snr-food-court".

quotes: add  chicken manchuria in menu with cost 159 with food photoes

acceptanceCriteria: Calling getAllMenuItems returns an item with uuid "chicken-manchuria" and price 159.
The item is returned with restaurantUuid "snr-food-court" and isAvailable = true.

requirements.text: Add a food photo asset for Chicken Manchuria at frontend/public/assets/generated/chicken-manchuria.dim_300x300.jpg and ensure the Home page menu card for uuid "chicken-manchuria" displays that image via the existing menuItemImageMap.
acceptanceCriteria: The file frontend/public/assets/generated/chicken-manchuria.dim_300x300.jpg exists in the build output.
On the Home page, the menu item with uuid "chicken-manchuria" renders using /assets/generated/chicken-manchuria.dim_300x300.jpg (not a fallback image).

constraints: Respect the single-actor backend architecture (all Motoko logic in backend/main.mo).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them only).
Do not edit frontend immutable hook paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
nonGoals: Do not add new payment methods or modify checkout flow.
Do not add a new admin password gate or change admin authorization behavior.
Do not introduce multi-photo galleries; a single representative photo is sufficient.

required: Close-up plated Chicken Manchuria Indo-Chinese dish photo, glossy sauce, garnished with spring onions, warm restaurant lighting (chicken-manchuria.dim_300x300.jpg)
